#LIBRARY
```{r}
library(rnn)
library(tidyr)
library(Metrics)
library(dplyr)
library(ie2misc)
library(BBmisc)
library(RSNNS)
```
#LOAD DATA
```{r}
train <- read.csv('train.csv', header = T)
test <- read.csv('test.csv', header = T)
```
#NORMALIZATION
```{r}
train_norm <- normalizeData(train[2:3], type='0_1')
test_norm <- normalizeData(test[2:3], type='0_1')
```
#CONVERT TO MATRIX_UNIVARIATE
```{r}
#convert to array
X <- as.matrix(cbind(train_norm[1:911, 1], train_norm[2:912, 1]))
Y <- as.matrix(train_norm[3:913, 1])

X1 <- as.matrix(cbind(test_norm[1:390, 1], test_norm[2:391, 1]))
Y1 <- as.matrix(test_norm[3:392, 1])
```
#MODEL_UNIVARIATE
```{r}
#looping model
sigmoid <- c("logistic", "Gompertz", "tanh")
#sigmoid <- c("logistic")
rule <- c("sgd", "adagrad")
#rule <- c("sgd")
for (ii in 1:9) {
  i = ii/10
  for (jj in 1:9) {
    j = jj/10
    for (k in 2:6) {
      for (l in sigmoid) {
        for (m in rule) {
      #running time
        start_time <- Sys.time()
        #prime model
          model <- trainr(Y, X, learningrate = i, momentum = j, hidden_dim = k, numepochs = 100, network_type = "rnn", sigmoid = l, use_bias = F, batch_size = 1, seq_to_seq_unsync = T, update_rule = m, epoch_function = c(epoch_print, epoch_annealing), loss_function = loss_L1)
        #predicted values
          result <- predictr(model, X1, hidden = F, real_output = T)
        #denormalize result
          denom_predict <- denormalizeData(result, getNormParameters(test_norm))
          denom_actual <- denormalizeData(Y1, getNormParameters(test_norm))
        end_time <- Sys.time()
        time_taken <- end_time - start_time
        #print(time_taken)
        #MAPE
          comparison_test <- as.vector(denom_actual)
          output <- as.vector(denom_predict)
          eror <- mape(comparison_test, output, na.rm = F)
          #print(eror)
        #export
          predict_uni <- cbind(denom_actual, denom_predict)
          form = sprintf('output_%s-%s-%s-%s-%s.csv', i, j, k, l, m)
          mape_uni <- cbind(i, j, k, l, m, eror, time_taken)
          write.csv(predict_uni, file = form, row.names = F)
          write.table(mape_uni, "mape-uni-2.csv", row.names = F, col.names = F, append = T, sep = ",")
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
#CONVERT TO MATRIX_MULTIVARIATE   
```{r}
#convert to array
X2 <- as.matrix(cbind(train_norm[1:911, c(1,2)], train_norm[2:912, c(1,2)]))
Y2 <- as.matrix(train_norm[3:913, 1])

X3 <- as.matrix(cbind(test_norm[1:390, c(1,2)], test_norm[2:391, c(1,2)]))
Y3 <- as.matrix(test_norm[3:392, 1])
```
#MODEL_MULTIVARIATE
```{r}
#looping model
sigmoid <- c("logistic", "Gompertz", "tanh")
#sigmoid <- c("logistic")
rule <- c("sgd", "adagrad")
#rule <- c("sgd")
for (ii in 1:9) {
  i = ii/10
  for (jj in 1:9) {
    j = jj/10
    for (k in 4:12) {
      for (l in sigmoid) {
        for (m in rule) {
      #running time
        start_time <- Sys.time()
        #prime model
          model <- trainr(Y2, X2, learningrate = i, momentum = j, hidden_dim = k, numepochs = 100, network_type = "rnn", sigmoid = l, use_bias = F, batch_size = 1, seq_to_seq_unsync = T, update_rule = m, epoch_function = c(epoch_print, epoch_annealing), loss_function = loss_L1)
        #predicted values
          result <- predictr(model, X3, hidden = F, real_output = T)
        #denormalize result
          denom_predict <- denormalizeData(result, getNormParameters(test_norm))
          denom_actual <- denormalizeData(Y3, getNormParameters(test_norm))
        end_time <- Sys.time()
        time_taken <- end_time - start_time
        #print(time_taken)
        #MAPE
          comparison_test <- as.vector(denom_actual)
          output <- as.vector(denom_predict)
          eror <- mape(comparison_test, output, na.rm = F)
          #print(eror)
        #export
          predict_uni <- cbind(denom_actual, denom_predict)
          form = sprintf('output_%s-%s-%s-%s-%s.csv', i, j, k, l, m)
          mape_uni <- cbind(i, j, k, l, m, eror, time_taken)
          write.csv(predict_uni, file = form, row.names = F)
          write.table(mape_uni, "mape-multi-2.csv", row.names = F, col.names = F, append = T, sep = ",")
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
